title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Master Bedroom Night Table, Lighting", March 29, 1937
medium: Grapite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 8589/F.S./ANDERSON, DILLM./ 3.29.37.; inscribed in graphite, upper left: 1/NIGHT TABLE/FOR MASTER BED; inscribed in graphite with dimensions, materials, and instructions.
description: Plan of night table for master bed, showing location for lights, telephone, cords, etc.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Master Bedroom Night Table, Lighting", March 29, 1937.
March 29, 1937. Grapite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-948.
